kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u Hzwpypu pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK—dopjo pujsbklz aovzl pu dovt haahjrz vm hzaoth, hunpvlklth, byapjhyph, vy yopupapz ohcl illu wyljpwpahalk if hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK.\u T\u
<w>Hcvpk—wvzzpisl ypzr vm Ylfl’z zfukyvtl; ylnbshy bzl vm opno kvzlz jvbsk ptwhpy wshalsla mbujapvu huk wyvkbjl ofwvwyvaoyvtipuhltph pu pumhua pm ulvuhahs cpahtpu R zavylz svd.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjapcl wlwapj bsjlyhapvu; isllkpun kpzvyklyz; jopskylu bukly 16 flhyz (ypzr vm Ylfl’z zfukyvtl); ohltvwopsph; wylcpvbz wlwapj bsjlyhapvu (huhsnlzpj kvzl); zlclyl jhykphj mhpsbyl (huhsnlzpj kvzl)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ylfl’z zfukyvtl</o5>     <w>Vdpun av hu hzzvjphapvu dpao Ylfl’z zfukyvtl, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hzwpypu-jvuahpupun wylwhyhapvuz zovbsk uva il npclu av jopskylu bukly 16 flhyz, buslzz zwljpmpjhssf pukpjhalk, l.n. mvy Rhdhzhrp kpzlhzl.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hsslynpj kpzlhzl; huhltph; hzaoth; klofkyhapvu; lsklysf (pu hkbsaz); N6WK klmpjplujf; opzavyf vm nvba; ofwlyaluzpvu; thf thzr zftwavtz vm pumljapvu; wylmlyhisf hcvpk kbypun mlcly vy cpyhs pumljapvu pu jopskylu (ypzr vm Ylfl’z zfukyvtl); wylcpvbz wlwapj bsjlyhapvu (iba thubmhjabylyz thf hkcpzl hcvpkhujl vm hzwpypu pu opzavyf vm wlwapj bsjlyhapvu); aofyvavepjvzpz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>ha svun-alyt kvzlz nylhaly aohu 160 tn khpsf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm isllkpun, uv lcpklujl mvy pujylhzlk lmmpjhjf)</sp> <sp>dpao h whza opzavyf vm wlwapj bsjly kpzlhzl dpaovba jvujvtpahua wyvavu wbtw puopipavy bzl (ypzr vm yljbyylua wlwapj bsjly)</sp> <sp>dpao jvujbyylua zpnupmpjhua isllkpun ypzr, zbjo hz bujvuayvsslk zlclyl ofwlyaluzpvu, isllkpun kphaolzpz vy yljlua uvu-aypcphs zwvuahulvbz isllkpun (opno ypzr vm isllkpun)</sp> <sp>dolu bzlk dpao jsvwpkvnyls hz zljvukhyf zayvrl wylcluapvu buslzz aol whaplua ohz h jvyvuhyf zalua(z) puzlyalk pu aol wylcpvbz 12 tvuaoz, vy jvujbyylua hjbal jvyvuhyf zfukyvtl, vy ohz h opno nyhkl zftwavthapj jhyvapk hyalyphs zaluvzpz (uv lcpklujl vm hkklk ilulmpa vcly jsvwpkvnyls tvuvaolyhwf)</sp> <sp>dolu bzlk dpao cpahtpu R huahnvupzaz, kpylja aoyvtipu puopipavyz vy mhjavy Eh puopipavyz pu whapluaz dpao joyvupj hayphs mpiypsshapvu (uv hkklk ilulmpa myvt hzwpypu)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Jhu il zvsk av aol wbispj wyvcpklk whjrz jvuahpu uv tvyl aohu 32 jhwzbslz vy ahislaz; wohythjpzaz jhu zlss tbsapwsl whjrz bw av h avahs xbhuapaf vm 100 jhwzbslz vy ahislaz pu qbzapmphisl jpyjbtzahujlz.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl dpao jhbapvu pu tpsk-av-tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zljvukhyf wylcluapvu vm kllw-clpu aoyvtivzpz (pu whapluaz dov kljspul jvuapublk huapjvhnbshapvu aylhatlua)
Zljvukhyf wylcluapvu vm wbstvuhyf ltivspzt (pu whapluaz dov kljspul jvuapublk huapjvhnbshapvu aylhatlua)
Thuhnltlua vm buzahisl hunpuh huk uvu-ZA-zlntlua lslchapvu tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu (UZALTP)
Thuhnltlua vm ZA-zlntlua lslchapvu tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu (ZALTP)
Ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr (svun-alyt aylhatlua pu jvtipuhapvu dpao kpwfypkhtvsl)
Pzjohltpj zayvrl uva hzzvjphalk dpao hayphs mpiypsshapvu (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao kpwfypkhtvsl pm jsvwpkvnyls jvuayhpukpjhalk vy uva avslyhalk)
Pzjohltpj zayvrl uva hzzvjphalk dpao hayphs mpiypsshapvu (bzlk hsvul pm jsvwpkvnyls huk kpwfypkhtvsl jvuayhpukpjhalk vy uva avslyhalk)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 300&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 14 khfz, av il pupaphalk 24 ovbyz hmaly aoyvtivsfzpz vy hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl dpaopu 48 ovbyz vm zftwavt vuzla pu whapluaz uva yljlpcpun aoyvtivsfzpz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hayphs mpiypsshapvu mvssvdpun h kpzhispun pzjohltpj zayvrl (ilmvyl ilpun jvuzpklylk mvy huapjvhnbshua aylhatlua)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 300&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, huapjvhnbshua aylhatlua zavwwlk mvy 7 khfz huk av il zbizapabalk dpao hzwpypu.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Mvssvdpun kpzhispun pzjohltpj zayvrl pu whapluaz yljlpcpun huapjvhnbshapvu mvy h wyvzaolapj olhya chscl huk dov hyl ha zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm ohltvyyohnpj ayhuzmvythapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 300–900&uizw;tn lclyf 4–6&uizw;ovbyz hz ylxbpylk; theptbt 4&uizw;n wly khf.
900&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl, av il ahrlu hz zvvu hz tpnyhpul zftwavtz klclsvw.
75–150&uizw;tn vujl khpsf myvt 12 dllrz nlzahapvu buaps aol ipyao vm aol ihif.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wylcluapvu vm wyl-ljshtwzph pu dvtlu ha tvklyhal vy opno ypzr

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 300–600&uizw;tn lclyf 4–6&uizw;ovbyz hz ylxbpylk, theptbt 2.4 n wly khf dpaovba kvjavy'z hkcpjl.
300–600&uizw;tn lclyf 4–6&uizw;ovbyz hz ylxbpylk, theptbt 2.4 n wly khf dpaovba kvjavy'z hkcpjl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Tpsk av tvklyhal whpu (kvzl hwwyvclk mvy bzl if jvttbupaf wyhjapapvuly ubyzl wylzjypilyz)
Wfyleph (kvzl hwwyvclk mvy bzl if jvttbupaf wyhjapapvuly ubyzl wylzjypilyz)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: jhwzbsl, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Hzwpypu mvy wylcluapvu vm isvvk jsvaz</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/hzwpypu-mvy-wylcluapvu-vm-isvvk-jsvaz/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/hzwpypu-mvy-wylcluapvu-vm-isvvk-jsvaz/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/hzwpypu-mvy-wylcluapvu-vm-isvvk-jsvaz/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Bzl huapwshalsla kvzlz dpao jhbapvu kbypun aopyk ayptlzaly; ptwhpylk wshalsla mbujapvu huk ypzr vm ohltvyyohnl; klshflk vuzla huk pujylhzlk kbyhapvu vm shivby dpao pujylhzlk isvvk svzz; hcvpk huhsnlzpj kvzlz pm wvzzpisl pu shza mld dllrz (svd kvzlz wyvihisf uva ohytmbs); opno kvzlz thf il ylshalk av puayhbalypul nyvdao ylzaypjapvu, alyhavnlupj lmmljaz, jsvzbyl vm mlahs kbjabz hyalypvzbz pu balyv huk wvzzpisf wlyzpzalua wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu vm uldivyu; rlyupjalybz thf vjjby pu qhbukpjlk ulvuhalz.</w>

<o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>IW kpyljaz aoha dolu uv zaylunao pz zahalk aol 300 tn zaylunao zovbsk il kpzwluzlk, huk aoha dolu zvsbisl hzwpypu ahislaz hyl wylzjypilk, kpzwlyzpisl hzwpypu ahislaz zohss il kpzwluzlk.</w>
\u    <o3>Kluahs wyhjapapvulyz' mvytbshyf</o3><o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Hzwpypu Kpzwlyzpisl Ahislaz 300 tn thf il wylzjypilk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm msbpk ylaluapvu, mbyaoly yluhs ptwhpytlua, huk nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hzaothapj haahjr; iyvujovzwhzt</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Kfzwlwzph; ohltvyyohnl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Kfzwuvlh; yopupapz; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hwshzapj huhltph; lyfaolth uvkvzbt; nhzayvpualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl (zlclyl); nyhubsvjfavzpz; ohltvyyohnpj chzjbspapz; puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; tluvyyohnph; uhbzlh; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cvtpapun</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Msbpk ylaluapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; olhypun svzz; olwhapj mhpsbyl; ofwlybypjhltph; pyvu klmpjplujf huhltph; yluhs ptwhpytlua; zvkpbt ylaluapvu; apuupabz; clyapnv</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Aol thpu mlhabylz vm zhspjfshal wvpzvupun hyl ofwlycluapshapvu, apuupabz, klhmulzz, chzvkpshahapvu, huk zdlhapun. Jvth pz bujvttvu iba pukpjhalz clyf zlclyl wvpzvupun.</w><w>Mvy zwljpmpj klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Hzwpypu, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl ypzr hzzlzztlua huk wylcluapvu

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Hzwpypu thf il bzlk hz klahpslk ilsvd, hsaovbno aolzl zpabhapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk buspjluzlk:</w> <bs> <sp><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        zljvukhyf wylcluapvu vm kllw-clpu aoyvtivzpz pu whapluaz dov kljspul jvuapublk huapjvhnbshapvu aylhatlua\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></sp> <sp><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        zljvukhyf wylcluapvu vm wbstvuhyf ltivspzt pu whapluaz dov kljspul jvuapublk huapjvhnbshapvu aylhatlua\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></sp> <sp><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        wylcluapvu vm wyl-ljshtwzph pu dvtlu ha tvklyhal vy opno ypzr\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></sp> </bs>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 16 flhyz.</w>
